evidence.text: Person B: No, you don’t. You see any other geese here your size? The accident that killed your family, saved you.

Person B: Roz and I go way back. Brightbill, you have an amazing journey ahead. I envy you, nothing can equal a goose’s first migration.
Person B: This flight is a gift Roz has given you.
Person B: I-- I could use a boost.

Person A: Migrations sure are tiring, huh? Yeah. They all hate me.
Person A: Roz? Roz. What are you doing here? I’m so glad to see you. There’s something I needed to tell you, but there wasn’t time. Roz I...
Person A: You’re not afraid of them. You grew up with these things.

Person A: Yeah, why not. Okay. There’s nothing I can do that you can’t. Here we go!
Person A: Tight turn! Come on! Dive! Now, climb! That’s it!
Person A: Keep up.
Person A: That’s it. Faster. Hurry. Come on.
